com.nttdocomo.util
Class Phone

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--com.nttdocomo.util.Phone
public class Phone
extends java.lang.Object

This provides the method for accessing the native voice communication function of a mobile phone.

Constant Field Values

USER_ID

public static final java.lang.String USER_ID

See Also:
Constant Field Values
Method Detail

getProperty

public static final java.lang.String getProperty(java.lang.String key)
This obtains the property value related to the designated key.
The obtainable property value is either "terminal-id" or "user-id."
When an invalid key is designated,return value is null.

Parameters:
key - Designates the character string to designate the property.
Throws:
java.lang.SecurityException - Generated when an application without "terminalid" designation at GetUtn key field in ADF tries to obtain a TerminalID or when an application without "userid" designation at GetUtn key field in ADF tries to obtain a UserID.
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - Generated when blank character string is designated for the argument
java.lang.NullPointerException - Generated when null is designated for the argument.
